rtems_network_config.h

00025 
00026 /*
00027  * Network configuration
00028  * 
00029  ************************************************************
00030  * EDIT THIS FILE TO REFLECT YOUR NETWORK CONFIGURATION     *
00031  * BEFORE RUNNING ANY RTEMS PROGRAMS WHICH USE THE NETWORK! * 
00032  ************************************************************
00033  *
00034  */
00035 
00036 #ifndef _RTEMS_NETWORKCONFIG_H_
00037 #define _RTEMS_NETWORKCONFIG_H_
00038 
00039 
00040 #define DEFAULT_IP_ADDRESS_STRING "192.168.0.2"
00041 #define DEFAULT_NETMASK_STRING    "255.255.255.0"
00042 #define DEFAULT_GATEWAY_STRING    "192.168.0.1"
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 #ifndef RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_NAME
00048 #warning "RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_NAME is not defined"
00049 #define RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_NAME "no_network1"
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #ifndef RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_ATTACH
00053 #warning "RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_ATTACH is not defined"
00054 #define RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_ATTACH 0
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #define NETWORK_STACK_PRIORITY 128
00058 /* #define RTEMS_USE_BOOTP */
00059 
00060 /* #define RTEMS_USE_LOOPBACK */
00061 
00062 #include <bsp.h>
00063 
00064 /*
00065  * Define RTEMS_SET_ETHERNET_ADDRESS if you want to specify the
00066  * Ethernet address here.  If RTEMS_SET_ETHERNET_ADDRESS is not
00067  * defined the driver will choose an address.
00068  */
00069 // NOTE:  The address below is a dummy address that should only ever
00070 // be used for testing on a private network.  DO NOT LET A PRODUCT
00071 // CONTAINING THIS ETHERNET ADDRESS OUT INTO THE FIELD!
00072 //#define RTEMS_SET_ETHERNET_ADDRESS
00073 #if (defined (RTEMS_SET_ETHERNET_ADDRESS))
00074 static char ethernet_address[6] = { 0x00, 0x80, 0x7F, 0x22, 0x61, 0x77 };
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 #define RTEMS_USE_LOOPBACK 
00078 #ifdef RTEMS_USE_LOOPBACK 
00079 /*
00080  * Loopback interface
00081  */
00082 extern int rtems_bsdnet_loopattach(struct rtems_bsdnet_ifconfig* dummy, int unused);
00083 static struct rtems_bsdnet_ifconfig loopback_config = {
00084         "lo0",                          /* name */
00085         rtems_bsdnet_loopattach,        /* attach function */
00086         NULL,                           /* link to next interface */
00087         "127.0.0.1",                    /* IP address */
00088         "255.0.0.0",                    /* IP net mask */
00089 };
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 /*
00093  * Default network interface
00094  */
00095 static struct rtems_bsdnet_ifconfig netdriver_config = {
00096         RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_NAME,          /* name */
00097         RTEMS_BSP_NETWORK_DRIVER_ATTACH,        /* attach function */
00098 
00099 #ifdef RTEMS_USE_LOOPBACK 
00100         &loopback_config,               /* link to next interface */
00101 #else
00102         NULL,                           /* No more interfaces */
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #if (defined (RTEMS_USE_BOOTP))
00106         NULL,                           /* BOOTP supplies IP address */
00107         NULL,                           /* BOOTP supplies IP net mask */
00108 #else
00109         "192.168.0.33",                 /* IP address */
00110         "255.255.255.0",                /* IP net mask */
00111 #endif /* !RTEMS_USE_BOOTP */
00112 
00113 #if (defined (RTEMS_SET_ETHERNET_ADDRESS))
00114         ethernet_address,               /* Ethernet hardware address */
00115 #else
00116         NULL,                           /* Driver supplies hardware address */
00117 #endif
00118         0                               /* Use default driver parameters */
00119 };
00120 
00121 /*
00122  * Network configuration
00123  */
00124 struct rtems_bsdnet_config rtems_bsdnet_config = {
00125         &netdriver_config,
00126 
00127 #if (defined (RTEMS_USE_BOOTP))
00128         rtems_bsdnet_do_bootp,
00129 #else
00130         NULL,
00131 #endif
00132 
00133         NETWORK_STACK_PRIORITY,         /* Default network task priority */
00134         1048576,                        /* Default mbuf capacity */
00135         1048576,                        /* Default mbuf cluster capacity */
00136 
00137 #if (!defined (RTEMS_USE_BOOTP))
00138         "testnode",             /* Host name */
00139         "example.org",          /* Domain name */
00140         "192.168.6.9",          /* Gateway */
00141         "192.168.7.41",         /* Log host */
00142         {"198.137.231.1" },     /* Name server(s) */
00143         {"207.202.190.162" },   /* NTP server(s) */
00144 #endif /* !RTEMS_USE_BOOTP */
00145 
00146 };
00147 
00148 #endif  /* _RTEMS_NETWORKCONFIG_H_ */
00149
